397000.name: Exile's End - Original Soundtrack by Keiji Yamagishi
397000.description:
Original Soundtrack composed and performed by Keiji Yamagishi, the legend behind Ninja Gaiden NES, Captain Tsubasa, Tecmo Bowl NES, and more! Mastered for CD quality so it sounds better than in-game! The soundtrack will be located in the "Soundtrack" folder in your installation directory.

  • Track 1 - Unexpected Challenge
  • Track 2 - Inescapable
  • Track 3 - Fuel, Oxygen, Heat
  • Track 4 - Miner's Ridge
  • Track 5 - Anomalous Readings
  • Track 6 - A Dead Channel
  • Track 7 - Integrated Circuit
  • Track 8 - Ripples in the Pond
  • Track 9 -Updrafts

Soundtrack brought to you by Bravewave Productions in cooperation with Marvelous
